titleInfo.title: Aerial View of Christian Brothers Campus looking to the Southeast

mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College buildings standing at the time of this photo were (from left): Rozier, Maurelian, Kenrick, Barry, the Library, Ave Maria, St. Joseph, the Science Center, Battersby, Benilde (with the Engineering labs), the Gym and the Theater. In the distance, Memphis' Liberty Bowl stadium is visible.
